publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3708 Donald Gorrie: CAB Hamilton In-Court Advice Service—That the Parliament congratulates Hamilton Citizens Advice Bureau (CAB) on the success of its In-Court Advice Service offering free, impartial and confidential advice to people involved in civil court matters such as debt and eviction and encourages the Scottish Executive, in partnership with local CABs, to roll out similar services to all sheriff courts in Scotland.

S2M-3708 Donald Gorrie: CAB Hamilton In-Court Advice Service—That the Parliament congratulates Hamilton Citizens Advice Bureau (CAB) on the success of its In-Court Advice Service offering free, impartial and confidential advice to people involved in civil court matters such as debt and eviction and encourages the Scottish Executive, in partnership with local CABs, to roll out similar services to all sheriff courts in Scotland.
S2M-3708 CAB Hamilton In-Court Advice Service (lodged on 8 December 2005) Michael McMahon*, John Swinburne*
S2M-3708 CAB Hamilton In-Court Advice Service (lodged on 8 December 2005) Michael Matheson*
S2M-3708 CAB Hamilton In-Court Advice Service (lodged on 8 December 2005) Elaine Smith*
